meanings.definition: The quality or state of being notable.
meanings.sent1: Her notableness in the community was due to her kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent2: The notableness of the painting made it stand out in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: His notableness in always wearing mismatched socks brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The notableness of her voice was like a beacon in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The notableness of the mountain peak against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily noticed or remembered.
meanings.sent1: The notableness of the bright red dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The notableness of his speech made it unforgettable to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The notableness of the cat wearing sunglasses was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The notableness of the thunderstorm was like nature's grand performance.
meanings.sent5: The notableness of the ancient ruins left a lasting impression on the visitors.
